EmailTemplate.description: Send from Training Event to all/any new hires or any wanting product orientation
EmailTemplate.name: Learning Plans: WEX Australia
EmailTemplate.subject: Start Your Learning Journey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Get started on your Learning Journey!
As part of your new journey with WEX, the Global Training Team has developed self-directed and self-paced Learning Plans to jump start your success in your new role.
Your Learning Plans can be found here: PHASE I - Get to know WEX: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1MSbGdaiqFVx0TLURiBqczsu-LDH7xfCgBSltasuiM8g/copy
PHASE II - WEX Australia Product Overview: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1P_YJ1j0ikp3ZhXAXENMb-FfIotgG89Ezcr2gtsgrFwQ/preview PHASE III - Salesforce Basics:https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WD_kk_5U1CHXonCWsD-od3RUgkcqZhLxa8Fbf49K9Hw/copy
Complete these Learning Plans and Knowledge Checks within the next 30 days.
Thank You, {!User.Name}
WEX University Global Training
